amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to enter into a contract with any person whose disclosures of a proceeding with a disposition listed in section 2313(c)(1) of title 41, United States Code, in the Federal Awardee Performance and Integrity Information System include the term "Fair Labor Standards Act.".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enter into a contract with any person whose disclosures of a proceeding with a disposition listed in section 2313(c)(1) of title 41, United States Code, in the Federal Awardee Performance and Integrity Information System include the term "Fair Labor Standards Act.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schakowsky amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Ms. Schakowsky.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schakowsky amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
